```{mermaid}
%%{init: { 'logLevel': 'debug', 'theme': 'base' } }%%
timeline
    title Google AdTech Milestones

    %% Define the decades first

    section Going CPC
    2000 : Google AdWords Launch
    2003 : Acquires Applied Semantics (AdSense foundation)
    2006 : Acquires dMarc Broadcasting (radio advertising tech)
    2007 : Acquires DoubleClick for $3.1B
    2008 : Acquires AdScape Media (in-game advertising)
    2009 : Acquires Teracent (dynamic display ad tech)

    section Programmatic field
    2010 : Launches Google Ad Exchange (AdX)
         : Acquires Invite Media (demand-side platform)
    2011 : Acquires AdMeld for $400M
    2014 : Acquires Adometry (attribution modeling)
         : Acquires Spider.io (anti-fraud technology)
    2015 : Launches Customer Match
    2018 : Rebrands AdWords and DoubleClick into Google Ads and Google Marketing Platform
    2019 : Acquires Fitbit (expanding data reach)

    section Privacy era
    2020 : Begins phasing out third-party cookies
    2023 : Ads Privacy Sandbox enters testing phase
```
